mapper.sql: t1.manager_evaluate,t1.user_evaluate, t1.id, t1.auction_id, t1.order_no, t1.car_id, t1.customer_id, t1.transaction_fee, t1.service_fee, t1.pay_time,t1.bargain_fee, t1.pay_fee, t1.pay_auth_time, t1.pay_auth_manager, t1.status, t1.lock_fee, t1.create_time, t1.pay_end_time,t1.auction_bid_record_id, t1.auto_auction_id,t1.remark, t1.agent_fee, t1.amount_fee
mapper.select: SELECT t1.manager_evaluate,t1.user_evaluate,t1.id,t1.car_id,t1.order_no,t1.amount_fee,t1.transaction_fee,t1.pay_fee,t1.customer_id, t1.service_fee,t1.agent_fee,t1.status,t1.create_time,t1.remark,t1.bargain_fee, t2.car_auto_no,t2.auto_info_name,t3.vin,t5.name AS user_name,t5.mobile,t8.identity_number,t4.auction_type, t6.pay_way,t6.pay_evidence,t6.pay_time,t6.log_no,t7.move_address,t9.`name` AS store_name,t9.service_tel FROM car_order t1 INNER JOIN car_auto t2 ON (t1.car_id=t2.id and t2.auto_auction_id=t1.auto_auction_id) INNER JOIN car_auto_info_detail t3 ON t2.id=t3.auto_id INNER JOIN car_auto_auction t4 on t1.auto_auction_id=t4.id LEFT JOIN wt_app_user t5 ON t1.customer_id=t5.id LEFT JOIN car_finance_pay_log t6 ON (t1.id=t6.order_id and t6.`type`='3') LEFT JOIN car_auto_transfer t7 ON (t1.id=t7.order_id AND t1.car_id=t7.auto_id) LEFT JOIN car_customer_auth t8 ON t1.customer_id=t8.user_id LEFT JOIN car_store t9 ON t2.store_id=t9.id WHERE t1.id = #{id}

SELECT t1.manager_evaluate,t1.user_evaluate,t1.id,t1.status,t1.pay_fee,t1.transaction_fee,t1.service_fee,t1.agent_fee,t1.order_no,t1.create_time, t1.pay_time,t1.pay_end_time,t1.car_id,t1.amount_fee, t2.main_photo,t2.car_auto_no,t2.auto_info_name,t2.report_colligation_ranks,t2.report_servicing_ranks, t3.vehicle_attribution_city,t3.vehicle_attribution_city_cn,t3.mileage,t4.move_to_where,t5.if_agent,t1.auto_auction_id, cs.`name`, cs.simple_name, cs.address FROM car_order t1 INNER JOIN car_auto t2 ON t1.car_id=t2.id INNER JOIN car_auto_info_detail t3 ON t2.id=t3.auto_id INNER JOIN car_auto_auction t5 ON t1.auto_auction_id=t5.id LEFT JOIN car_auto_procedures t4 ON t4.auto_id=t1.car_id INNER JOIN car_store cs ON cs.id = t2.store_id WHERE t1.id=#{orderId}

SELECT count(1) as orderNum, sum(case when `status`='1' then 1 else 0 end) as unPay, sum(case when (`status`='2' or `status`='3' or `status`='4' or `status`='5' or `status`='6') then 1 else 0 end) as dealing, sum(case when (`status`='7' and user_evaluate = 0) then 1 else 0 end) as unEvaluated, sum(case when `status`='7' then 1 else 0 end) as finish from car_order where customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT t2.car_auto_no,t3.license_number,t2.auto_info_name,t3.vin,t4.auction_plate_num,t1.service_fee, t1.transaction_fee,t1.agent_fee,t1.amount_fee,t4.name as customerName,t5.auction_code,t6.title AS auctionName FROM car_order t1 INNER JOIN car_auto t2 ON t1.car_id=t2.id INNER JOIN car_auto_info_detail t3 ON t2.id=t3.auto_id LEFT JOIN wt_app_user t4 ON t1.customer_id=t4.id LEFT JOIN car_locale_auction_car t5 on t5.auto_auction_id = t1.auto_auction_id LEFT JOIN car_locale_auction t6 on t6.id=t1.auction_id WHERE t1.id=#{id}
